fixes.name: Number of Complaints
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau COUNTD([Complaint ID]) to DAX DISTINCTCOUNT('complaints'[Complaint ID]). Kept as a measure because it is an aggregation over rows.

fixes.name: All Complaints (Not Selected)
fixes.solution_explanation: Replaced the Tableau parameter reference with SELECTEDVALUE('Selected Product'[Display As]) and converted the conditional IF to DAX. References the dependent measure 'complaints'[Number of Complaints]; returns BLANK() when the condition is not met.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references a parameter, and all parameter-based calculations must be measures.
